Love | Serve | Inspire




Nishchal's words are profound yet simple to say the least. His diction and writing is free flowing, and one almost anyone who has an even slightly expanded consciousness, can resonate with. He serves (wo)mankind, by liberating them from their own shackles of conditioning. This book is only the beginnings of a legend in the making. One who will set the world free, to move closer to their own authentic truth.

Would You Like Us To Donate The Books For You?





How do we donate the books?

Our entire day goes around meeting college kids and meet-ups with The young generation with a streak of new ideas building disruptive startups. Along side this, we also visit various colleges and universities for talks. These are the various spaces where we know the words from these donated book will motivate and inspire them to follow their own bliss, gifted by you!
